headline: Brown-Forman Corporation (BF-B): Use The Bounce In Share Price To Sell, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 12 Latest Stocks Jim Cramer Discussed. Brown-Forman Corporation (NYSE:BF-B) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Brown-Forman Corporation (NYSE:BF-B) is the struggling alcoholic beverages firm whose shares have lost 18% year-to-date on the back of a massive 17.9% dip in June. The shares fell after the firm’s quarterly report saw […]
